about_the_game:
In this game you get into an open world where you can do whatever you want. You can dig, collect resources, build houses and bases, plant plants and animals, and explore dungeons and caves. You can also travel to different planets, meeting new friends and enemies. You can play alone or with friends online, creating your own worlds or joining others. Your imagination is the only limit in this game.

The game has many different types of weapons, armor, tools and accessories that you can use to fight and survive. You can also craft your own items from found or mined materials. The game has different biomes such as forests, deserts, jungles, snows and oceans. Each biome has its own characteristics and dangers. You can also face different bosses and events that will test your skills and readiness.

There are also other settings in the game that you can change to your liking. You can choose the size of the world, the number of players in the network game, the difficulty of the character and other parameters. You can also use different mods that add new content and features to the game.

In general, this is a game for those who love freedom, creativity and adventure. This is a game for those who want to create their own world and explore it on their own.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 LTS
  • Processor: 2.5 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1 GB
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 LTS
  • Processor: 3 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2 GB
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 150 MB available space

  • Storage: 150 MB available space

short_description: Create and explore endless worlds, fight, craft and build. Play alone or with friends. Travel the planets. Enjoy freedom, creativity and fantasy.
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Arabic, Bulgarian, Portuguese - Brazil, Hungarian, Vietnamese, Greek, Danish, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Dutch, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Russian*, Thai, Turkish, Ukrainian, Finnish, Czech, Swedish, Japanese
*languages with full audio support
